name: Rhodeia of Loch
storytext: "As long as rain falls and rivers flow... water will exist forever... "
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Rhodeia of Loch

skills.name: Oceanid Mimic Summoning
skills.descriptionraw: Randomly summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122010]</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones).
skills.descriptionreplaced: Randomly summons 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Oceanid Mimic</color> (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones).
skills.description: Randomly summons 1 Oceanid Mimic (Prioritizes summoning a different type from preexisting ones).

skills.name: The Myriad Wilds

skills.name: Tide and Torrent
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +2 additional DMG.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. For each friendly Summon on the field, deals +2 additional DMG.
